item.title: Layers of litter in the bushes around the bin and bus stop, 1st January
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springwater Close, Plumstead

item.title: 1/1/26 - Yet again (about the 4th occurrence) the Give Way sign in Valley Rd at the jct with Shortlands Rd is rotated 90° away from oncoming traffic., 1st January
item.description:
1/1/26 - Yet again (about the 4th occurrence) the Give Way sign in Valley Rd at the jct with Shortlands Rd is rotated 90° away from oncoming traffic. I have previously requested a permanent fix such as putting a pair of nuts and bolts through the sign and post. Yet nothing is done. The sign rotates. I report it. You do a temporary repair by rotating it back. It rotates again. Please do a PERMANENT repair!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valley Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive amounts of flytipped rubbish, 1st January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stembridge Road, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Cycling routes and pathways, 1st January
item.description:
Cycling routers and pathways to new shuttle bus service are always full of glass because of the large venue (not o2) that keeps young people getting drunk and fly tip, smash bottles and vomit on pavements, leave take away foods. Please contact owner if the property or please give extra care to this area as I had to spent lots of money to fix my bicycle punctured. Vomit next to bus station has been there for more than a week.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Millennium Way, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The streetlight in Meadside close is flashing on & off, 1st January
item.description:
